gmd:useLimitation.gco:CharacterString: See Copernicus Marine Environment Monitoring Service Data commitments and licence at: http://marine.copernicus.eu/web/27-service-commitments-and-licence.php

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: The myOcean products depends on other products for production or validation. The detailed list of dependencies is given in ISO19115's aggregationInfo (ISO19139 Xpath = "gmd:MD_Metadata/*[local-name()='identificationInfo']/*[local-name()='aggregationInfo'][./*[local-name()='MD_AggregateInformation']/*[local-name()='initiativeType']/*[local-name()='DS_InitiativeTypeCode']/@codeListValue='upstream-validation' or 'upstream-production']")
